text:
@realDonaldTrump @NYCMayor It is so heart warming to see that during this crisis Mr. D.J. Trump is doing everything to reunite people instead of dividing them!! What a wonderful father of the nation 😍
@realDonaldTrump @PressSec @IngrahamAngle #Republican #RepublicansVirus #Democrats #coronavirus #Corona
